name: Boosted
description: Orange Design System's official Web framework, built according to the Orange Design System Guidelines. It is a fork of Bootstrap with custom rendering and specific Orange components.

components.name: Accordion
components.definition: Vertically collapsing accordions based on Boosted's Collapse component.

components.name: Alerts
components.definition: Provide contextual feedback messages for typical user actions with an handful of available and flexible alert messages.

concepts.name: basic
concepts.description: Basic alerts with danger, information, warning and error states.

concepts.name: sizes
concepts.description: Alerts can come with a smaller variant.

concepts.name: additional-content
concepts.description: Alerts can contain additional HTML elements like headings, links and paragraphs.

concepts.name: dismissible
concepts.description: Alerts can be optionally dismissible via a close button.

components.name: Back to top
components.definition: Sticky back-to-top link appearing after scrolling down one viewport height.

components.name: Badge
components.definition: Small count and labeling component.

concepts.name: count
concepts.description: Position the badge in the corner of a link with an icon.

components.name: Breadcrumb
components.definition: Indicate the current page's location within a navigational hierarchy.

anatomy.name: Home
anatomy.description: Link to the homepage of the website.

anatomy.name: Chevron
anatomy.description: Chevrons that visually separate each level in the breadcrumb trail. Not interactive.

components.name: Buttons
components.definition: Custom button styles for actions in forms, dialogs, and more with support for multiple sizes, states, and more.

concepts.name: size
concepts.description: Buttons can come with smaller and larger variants.

components.name: Button group
components.definition: Group a series of buttons together on a single line or stack them in a vertical column.

concepts.name: radio
concepts.description: Combine button-like radio toggle buttons into a seamless looking button group.

components.name: Card
components.definition: Flexible and extensible content container with multiple variants and options.

concepts.name: image
concepts.description: Basic card container with an image.

components.name: Carousel
components.definition: A slideshow component for cycling through elementsâ€”images or slides of text.

concepts.name: default
concepts.description: Basic carousel with previous and next controls.

concepts.name: pause-play-button
concepts.description: Carousel with pause/play button for accessibility.

components.name: Checkbox
components.definition: Custom checkbox style for consistent cross-browser appearance.

components.name: Close button
components.definition: Generic close button for dismissing content like modals and alerts.

components.name: Collapse
components.definition: Toggle the visibility of content with a few classes.

components.name: Dropdowns
components.definition: Toggle contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and more.

components.name: File input
components.definition: Custom file input style for consistent cross-browser appearance.

anatomy.name: Help text
anatomy.description: Indicating there is no file selected.

anatomy.name: Input field
anatomy.description: Once a file has been selected, the name of the specific file with the file extension replaces the default help text in the input field.

concepts.name: Multiple
concepts.description: File input that handles multiple files.

concepts.name: Multiple (with file selection)
concepts.description: File input that handles multiple files with file selection.

concepts.name: Sizes
concepts.description: File input can come with smaller and larger variants.

components.name: Footer
components.definition: Powerful, responsive, and customizable footer for branding, navigation and more.

components.name: Img
components.definition: Opting images into responsive behavior and lightweight styles via classes.

components.name: List group
components.definition: Flexible and powerful component for displaying a series of content.

components.name: Modal
components.definition: Dialogs for lightboxes, user notifications, or completely custom content.

components.name: Navbar
components.definition: Powerful, responsive navigation header including support for branding, navigation, and more.

components.name: Navs & tabs
components.definition: Navigation components.

components.name: Offcanvas
components.definition: Hidden sidebars for navigation, shopping carts, and more.

components.name: Orange navbar
components.definition: Exclusive responsive branded navbars.

components.name: Pagination
components.definition: Showing pagination to indicate a series of related content across multiple pages.

components.name: Placeholders
components.definition: Components that indicate something may still be loading.

components.name: Popovers
components.definition: Components to provide extra information or show more content like those found in iOS.

components.name: Progress
components.definition: Custom progress bars featuring support for stacked bars, animated backgrounds, and text labels.

anatomy.name: Label
anatomy.description: Describes the process that the progress bar refers to.

anatomy.name: Bar
anatomy.description: Indicates how much the process has progressed.

anatomy.name: Track
anatomy.description: The area that the bar moves on top of and visually represents the total duration of the process.

components.name: Quantity selector
components.definition: Incremental and decremental display of small numbers.

components.name: Radios
components.definition: Custom radios style for consistent cross-browser appearance.

concepts.name: checked
concepts.description: Checked attribute of the radio button.

components.name: Range
components.definition: Custom range style for consistent cross-browser appearance, and built-in customization.

concepts.name: value
concepts.description: Range with value for better usability.

components.name: Scrollspy
components.definition: Automatically update navigation or list group components based on scroll position to indicate which link is currently active in the viewport.

components.name: Select
components.definition: Custom select style for consistent cross-browser appearance.

components.name: Spinners
components.definition: Indicate the loading state of a component or page.

components.name: Star rating
components.definition: 5-star rating component.

components.name: Stepped process
components.definition: Bar used for multiple steps forms process.

components.name: Sticker
components.definition: Custom stickers to inform people about new offers.

components.name: Switches
components.definition: Custom switch style for consistent cross-browser appearance.

components.name: Tables
components.definition: Custom table style for consistent cross-browser appearance, and built-in customization.

components.name: Tags
components.definition: Convey information, apply filters or display a selection of items.

concepts.name: informative
concepts.description: Informative tag to display categories. No interaction.

concepts.name: filter
concepts.description: Filter tag that can be actionable.

concepts.name: navigation
concepts.description: Navigation tag that can be actionable. Usually used as anchor links.

concepts.name: input
concepts.description: Input tag that can be closed.

concepts.name: sizes
concepts.description: Tags can come with smaller variant.

components.name: Title bars
components.definition: Exclusive branded responsive title bars.

components.name: Toasts
components.definition: Push notifications to your visitors with a toast, a lightweight and easily customizable alert message.

components.name: Tooltips
components.definition: Custom tooltips.

concepts.name: directions
concepts.description: Tooltips can be positioned on the top, right, bottom, or left of the target element.
